Literature.Title: Structural insights into and activity analysis of the antimicrobial peptide myxinidin.
Literature.Author: Cantisani M, Finamore E, Mignogna E, Falanga A, Nicoletti GF, Pedone C, Morelli G, Leone M, Galdiero M, Galdiero S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 11219(MIC=5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 13388(MIC=30µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=25µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=15µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=5µM)
